title: Blog: 10 Tips for Better Email Marketing
content: Email marketing remains one of the most effective digital marketing channels with an average ROI of $42 for every $1 spent. Here are 10 proven strategies to improve your email campaigns: 1. Segment your audience 2. Personalize subject lines 3. Optimize for mobile 4. A/B test everything 5. Use clear CTAs 6. Time your sends right 7. Clean your list regularly 8. Provide value first 9. Tell stories 10. Analyze and iterate.
